subject: Football
Hands
lead_paragraph: The Patriots tight end Rob Gronkowski, whose hands measure 10¾ inches from thumb to pinkie, caught 17 touchdowns during the regular season — a record for tight ends — and three more in the playoffs.
snippet: The Patriots tight end Rob Gronkowski, whose hands measure 10¾ inches from thumb to pinkie, caught 17 touchdowns during the regular season — a record for tight ends — and three more in the playoffs.
